title: of the EirGrid, Electricity and Turf (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 17 of 2022),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the EirGrid, Electricity and Turf
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the EirGrid, Electricity and Turf 

(Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited eirgrid electricity turf (amendment) act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: of the EirGrid, Electricity and Turf (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 17 of 2022),
heading: 2. The 12th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the EirGrid,
text_raw:
2. The 12th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the EirGrid, 
Electricity and Turf (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 17 of 2022) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 July, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [352] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
